name: ridiculous-coding
description: Make your coding experience 1000x more ridiculous in VS Code: blips, booms, fireworks, XP and levels.

ridiculousCoding.blips.description: Show 'blip' effects when typing and newline animation.

ridiculousCoding.chars.description: Overlay the last key/character label with the effects.

ridiculousCoding.shake.description: Approximate editor 'shake' by jittering effect decorations.

ridiculousCoding.shakeAmplitude.description: Shake amplitude in pixels (uniform in all directions).

ridiculousCoding.shakeDecayMs.description: How long (ms) shake continues after the last keypress.

ridiculousCoding.sound.description: Play sounds for blips, booms, and fireworks from the panel.

ridiculousCoding.fireworks.description: Celebrate level-ups with fireworks in the panel.

ridiculousCoding.leveling.baseXp.description: Base XP used in the level-up curve (original plugin uses 50).

ridiculousCoding.enableStatusBar.description: Show XP/Level in the status bar.

ridiculousCoding.reducedEffects.description: Reduce visual and sound effects for accessibility. When enabled, disables most animations and sounds.

ridiculousCoding.combo.maxTrail.description: Maximum number of trailing decorations to keep per effect type.

ridiculousCoding.combo.ttl.blipMs.description: Lifetime (ms) of a blip trail decoration.

ridiculousCoding.combo.ttl.boomMs.description: Lifetime (ms) of a boom trail decoration.

ridiculousCoding.combo.ttl.newlineMs.description: Lifetime (ms) of a newline trail decoration.

ridiculousCoding.combo.anim.frameMs.description: Animation frame interval in milliseconds for trail updates.

ridiculousCoding.combo.anim.floatEm.description: Additional vertical float distance (in em) over lifetime.

ridiculousCoding.combo.anim.scaleAdd.description: Additional scale amount added over lifetime.
